title: Heroes of Lucha Libre
overview: Heroes of Lucha Libre is a superhero show based on the centenary tradition of Lucha Libre. Fights, drama, heroes and superpowers combined in a show that offers the highest production and VFX standards in a powerful and entertained TV series. The four islands embark with Luchador Wars to win the Four Power Rings of Earth, Wind, Fire, and Water, so they can claim the Sacred Belt of Xarunca, which will make them Masters of the Universe.
